PrivacyPolicyPage.introduction: Chronicle (hereinafter referred to as 'we' or 'this platform') attaches great importance to your privacy protection. This privacy policy aims to help you understand how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information, as well as how you can control this information.

accountInfo.title: Account Information
accountInfo.description: When you register an account, we will collect your name, email address, avatar and other information, which may be provided through third-party login services you use (such as Google)

contentInfo.title: Content Information
contentInfo.description: All content you publish on this platform, including events, perspectives, comments, images and other materials

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: When you contact us, we will collect the communication information you provide

logInfo.title: Log Information
logInfo.description: We collect information about how you access and use this platform, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, access date and time, page views, etc.

deviceInfo.title: Device Information
deviceInfo.description: We may collect information about the device you use, including device model, unique device identifier, etc.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to identify your browser or device, remember your preferences, and collect information about how you use this platform

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
points: Provide, maintain and improve our services
Process your account registration and login
Allow you to create, share and view content
Send you service notifications, updates and support information
Monitor and analyze the use of this platform to improve user experience
Prevent fraud, abuse and violations of our terms of service
Comply with legal obligations

infoSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
infoSharing.intro: We will not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

withYourConsent.title: With Your Consent
withYourConsent.description: With your explicit consent, we may share your information

thirdPartyProviders.title: Third-Party Service Providers
thirdPartyProviders.description: We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate this platform, and these providers must comply with strict confidentiality agreements

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.description: We may disclose your information when required by law, or to protect our rights, property or safety, or the rights, property or safety of others

businessTransactions.title: Business Transactions
businessTransactions.description: In the event of a merger, acquisition, asset transfer or similar business transaction, if personal information transfer is involved, we will require the new company or organization holding your personal information to continue to be bound by this privacy policy

infoSecurity.title: Information Security
infoSecurity.description: We take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. These measures include but are not limited to data encryption, access control, security auditing and regular security assessments. However, please note that internet transmission is not completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of any information you transmit via the internet.

yourPrivacyRights.title: Your Privacy Rights

accessRight.title: Right of Access
accessRight.description: You have the right to access personal information we hold about you

correctionRight.title: Right to Rectification
correctionRight.description: You have the right to request us to correct inaccurate personal information

deletionRight.title: Right to Erasure
deletionRight.description: In certain circumstances, you have the right to request us to delete your personal information

restrictionRight.title: Right to Restriction of Processing
restrictionRight.description: In certain circumstances, you have the right to restrict our processing of your personal information

dataPortability.title: Right to Data Portability
dataPortability.description: You have the right to receive personal information you have provided to us in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format, and the right to transmit this data to another data controller

objectionRight.title: Right to Object
objectionRight.description: In certain circumstances, you have the right to object to our processing of your personal information

withdrawConsent.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
withdrawConsent.description: If we process your personal information based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time

yourPrivacyRights.contactUs: To exercise any of the above rights, please contact us: support@chronicle.example.com

minorsProtection.title: Protection of Minors
minorsProtection.description: This platform is not directed at minors under the age of 18. We will not intentionally collect personal information from minors under the age of 18. If we discover that we have collected personal information from minors without verifiable parental or legal guardian consent, we will immediately delete the relevant information.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to achieve the purposes described in this privacy policy, unless laws require or permit longer retention periods. When we no longer need your personal information, we will take reasonable measures to securely delete or anonymize this information.

internationalDataTransfer.title: International Data Transfers
internationalDataTransfer.description: Your personal information may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside of China. We will take appropriate security measures to ensure that your personal information is protected at the same level as in China.

privacyPolicyUpdates.title: Privacy Policy Updates
privacyPolicyUpdates.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. When we make significant changes, we will post the updated privacy policy on the platform and, where appropriate, notify you by email. Your continued use of this platform will be deemed your acceptance of the modified privacy policy.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, or wish to exercise your data subject rights, please contact us:

If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use this platform.

platformDescription.title: Platform Description
platformDescription.description: Chronicle is a multi-perspective event recording platform that allows users to create, share and view different perspectives on various events. The purpose of this platform is to promote comprehensive understanding of events, encourage open dialogue and respect different viewpoints.
